author: Hilary Brueck
title: A virus expert who studies how infections spread through the air shares his tips for staying safe during the coronavirus pandemic
description: There's still a lot we don't know about the novel coronavirus and how it's transmitted from person to person. Virologist Don Milton said it's "not inconceivable" that you could catch the virus from someone you may pass on the street, like a breathless runner,…
content:
Virologist Don Milton says he isn't going outside much these days, now that COVID-19 infections are being detected in record numbers across the US.
But he prefers to get a little fresh air as he chats with reporters, walking the streets of the Washington DC … [+5662 chars]
